lines.text: [Trying to get the $300 needed to open the school]
I'm president of the student body and prepared for almost ANY sacrifice.
Well, I'm not exactly wonderful, but I'm awfully attractive in a dynamic sort of way.
What's that other college for girls, the one that won't give its right name?
I'm not interested in the men.
But I haven't got a band!

[referring to D. Arnaz]
With the possible exception of one or two of us, who has ?
Don't be an all-American all your life!
